allow:
Bash("
- Literals \(coordinates, dates, IDs\) stored directly

Key properties included:
- P17 country \(97.8%\), P625 coordinates \(76.5%\)
- P36 capital \(69.1%\), P2046 area \(67.3%\), P1082 population \(60.7%\)
- P18 image \(49.4%\), P571 inception \(48.6%\), P47 borders \(48.6%\)
- P41 flag \(30.5%\), P94 coat of arms \(32.6%\), P1705 native label \(30.2%\)
- Plus 38 more properties

Also adds check_p131_issue.py which investigates P131 values - most \(69%\)
correctly point to countries, with some pointing to historical entities
like Ottoman eyalets/vilayets.

Output: first_level_divisions_enriched.csv \(5MB, 52 columns\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash("C:\\Users\\Immanuelle\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python313\\python.exe" -c "
import csv
import sys
import io
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)

with open\(''first_level_divisions_enriched.csv'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    reader = csv.DictReader\(f\)
    entities_with_p576 = []
    for row in reader:
        if row.get\(''P576'', ''''\).strip\(\):
            entities_with_p576.append\({
                ''label'': row[''label''],
                ''qid'': row[''qid''],
                ''instance_of'': row[''instance_of_qid''],
                ''P31'': row.get\(''P31'', ''''\),
                ''P576'': row[''P576'']
            }\)

print\(f''Entities with P576 \(dissolved date\): {len\(entities_with_p576\)}''\)
print\(\)
print\(''Sample of entities with P576:''\)
print\(''-'' * 100\)
for e in entities_with_p576[:30]:
    print\(f""{e[''qid'']:<12} {e[''label''][:35]:<36} P31: {e[''P31''][:40]:<41}""\)
    print\(f""             P576: {e[''P576''][:80]}""\)
    print\(\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\Immanuelle\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python313\\python.exe" -c "
import csv
import sys
import io
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)

with open\(''first_level_divisions_enriched.csv'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    reader = csv.DictReader\(f\)
    rows = list\(reader\)

total = len\(rows\)
props = [''P17'',''P625'',''P242'',''P2046'',''P1082'',''P36'',''P300'',''P18'',''P47'',''P41'',''P94'',''P576'']
labels = [''country'',''coordinates'',''locator map'',''area'',''population'',''capital'',''ISO code'',''image'',''borders'',''flag'',''coat of arms'',''dissolved'']

print\(f''Total: {total}''\)
print\(\)
for p, label in zip\(props, labels\):
    filled = sum\(1 for r in rows if r.get\(p,''''\).strip\(\)\)
    pct = filled/total*100
    print\(f''{p:<6} {label:<15} {filled:>5} \({pct:.1f}%\)''\)
")
